DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study explore relationship attempt and/or complete suicide report experience chronic pain among adult veteran population . Specific aim include ) examine experience chronic pain patient either attempted and/or complete suicide , non-suicide attempt mental health patient , non-mental health chronic pain patient b ) determine possible difference report experience chronic pain base mental physical diagnosis , age , gender , ethnicity , occupation , patient 's recorded perception depression and/or quality life . As articulated Amendment approve June 13 , 2008 , additional area interest include history neurological disease ( e.g . traumatic brain injury ) and/or mental health diagnosis . History neurologic disease mental health diagnosis also identify chart review ( per approval obtain June 13 , 2008 ) . As study also compare difference ( e.g. , mental health , neurological disease ) veterans history suicide attempt , completion , lifetime history suicidality match control veteran without history suicide attempt , completion , lifetime history suicide . The relationship suicidal behavior , attempted/completed suicide , report Post Traumatic Stress Disorder ( PTSD ) symptoms among adult veteran population also interest . Additionally , data set used complete validation study regard Self-Directed Violence Classification System ( SDVCS ) . Specifically , relevant information subject chart note regard self-directed violence ( SDV ) use categorize thought behavior accord SDVCS .
